name: Amafo
description:
Amafo is a game in which you will need to collect little creatures called "Amafo" in order to solve puzzles. I hope you will enjoy this voxel-styled short game created for the VimJam2.

You will start with the capacity of 3 Amafo. By collecting the green stones around the map, your max capacity will increase, which is crucial to advance into the game. Your final Objective is to acquire 8 total Amafo.

  • Controls
    • W -> Move Forward
    • S -> Move Downward
    • D -> Move to the Right
    • A -> Move to the Left
    • V -> Spawn Amafo
    • B -> Despawn ALL Amafo
